Ryohei Seto - Soft Matter and Rheology

  • Ryohei Seto - Soft Matter and Rheology
  • setoryohei@me.com

    I am a researcher working on soft-matter physics, complex fluid mechanics, and rheology with Prof Masao Doi at Beihang University in Beijing. I'm interested in non-equilibrium dissipative dynamics in soft-matter systems.
